output_list.reason: Integer overflow in withdraw function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in burn function allows the owner to burn a token that has an arbitrary value.
In transferFrom function, the user can set the balance of the wrong user.
In approve function, the user can set the balance of the wrong user.
Integer overflow in getTokenBalance function allows the owner to get the balance of an arbitrary user.
